summary: The Rugrats travel to Paris, France, where Chuckie (Christine Cavanaugh) hopes to find a new mother and keep his father from marrying an evil business woman.
cast: Elizabeth Daily|Tara Strong|Cheryl Chase|Christine Cavanaugh|Cree Summer|Kath Soucie|Michael Bell|Tress MacNeille|Casey Kasem|Joe Alaskey|Debbie Reynolds|Jack Riley|Susan Sarandon|John Lithgow|Marlene Mitsuko Yamane|Darrell Kunitomi|Goh Misawa|Julia Kato|Melanie Chartoff|Margaret Smith|Phillipe Simon|Phil Proctor|Paul Demeyer|Mako|Tim Curry|Kevin Michael Richardson|Billy West|Dionne Quan|Richard Michel|Philip Benichou|Braden Wright|Lisa McClowry|Charles Fathy|Dan Castellaneta|Hannah Makragelidis|Charlie Adler|Shannon Stephens|Roger Rose|Ben Sunderland|Ken Enomoto|Françoise Robertson|Bruno Stephane|Tohoru Masamune|Patricia Ayame Thomson

title: Rugrats en París: la película
